title: 【搬运】1.9趣味小游戏《My Franchise》我的经营
txt_content:
My Franchise
我的经营






英文介绍Mojang has finally released a franchise option for their world-famous restaurants. As a new owner of the Miner’s Diner franchise, it’s your job to prepare the orders correctly and keep a good reputation for the sake of Mojang and their renowned businesses. Your end goal is to own all three restaurants and gain a reputation of at least 200 to become a Master Chef.

My Franchise map is a simulation/puzzle game and some parts have a steep learning curve which require skill and memorization in order to progress through the game. This map is Single-Player only, and will not work correctly with multiple players. Press the Important Info button in the starting area for the basic instructions.


Mojang终于发布了其著名的餐厅特许经营期权。作为一种新的矿工的餐厅特许经营店主，你的工作是准备正确订单上的食物并保持Mojang和著名企业的利益及良好的信誉。
你的最终目标是拥有所有三家餐厅，并获得至少200的声誉，成为一名厨师长。
My Franchise是一个需要学习技能和记忆的模拟/益智游戏。
这张图只允许单人游戏，按下起始区域中的“Important Info”按钮来查看游戏方法。

      设置：
能见度：至少6视野：正常当你不在起始区域时，鼠标是不允许的移动。如果有问题，尝试调整鼠标灵敏度如果游戏延迟较高，尝试关闭平滑照明，并在起始区域设置“Day Time”



我的视频教程：
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMTU2MjQwOTk5Mg==.html
